Man dies after police interaction in central Auckland: Cops begin probe, IPCA notified https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-dies-after-police-interaction-in-central-auckland-cops-begin-probe-ipca-notified/RN3JQDLBYREQ7CZWCXDA3SAUSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-dies-after-police-interaction-in-central-auckland-cops-begin-probe-ipca-notified/RN3JQDLBYREQ7CZWCXDA3SAUSE/ Raphael FranksThe Herald was told by an anonymous source the man was homeless. Sun, 10 Nov 2024 01:15:29 +0000 Police are investigating the death of a man who fell and struck his head during an interaction with police in central Auckland.

Burnett Foundation told to remove gay sex education ads https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aids-foundation-told-to-remove-gay-sex-education-ad-near-auckland-dairy/LWS6TRWS7VG4XDVRQTDBQRH6QA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aids-foundation-told-to-remove-gay-sex-education-ad-near-auckland-dairy/LWS6TRWS7VG4XDVRQTDBQRH6QA/ Jeremy Wilkinson"I think any big poster promoting anal sex outside a dairy is a no-go." Sir Peter Jackson bowls $2.5m waterfront house, council documents reveal plans https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sir-peter-jackson-bowls-25m-waterfront-house-council-documents-reveal-plans/UOERLXM56RDSROK7ZFRAVKVBTA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sir-peter-jackson-bowls-25m-waterfront-house-council-documents-reveal-plans/UOERLXM56RDSROK7ZFRAVKVBTA/ Ethan ManeraThe billionaire film director owns 12 properties on the street. Sat, 09 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 The Karaka Bays house owned by Sir Peter Jackson was demolished, with plans to build a garden and outdoor entertainment area. Photo / Google Maps.

US election: Yes, Donald Trump is a bad guy, but he should be a better President than Joe Biden – Heather du Plessis-Allan https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/us-election-yes-donald-trump-is-a-bad-guy-but-he-should-be-better-a-president-than-joe-拜登-希瑟-杜-普莱西斯-艾伦/Q6KGLOIT45DZ5HPOJ5GCWEEDJ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/us-election-yes-donald-trump-is-a-bad-guy-but-he-should-be-better-a-president-than-joe-拜登-希瑟-杜-普莱西斯-艾伦/Q6KGLOIT45DZ5HPOJ5GCWEEDJ4/ Heather du Plessis-AllanOPINION: Trump's a big mouth - it’s hard to know what’s real and what’s bluff. Sat, 09 Nov 2024 16:58:44 +0000 If there’s a lesson to be taken from Donald Trump’s massive win, it’s that hysterical warnings about the bloke don’t work anymore, if they ever did. Photo / AFP
Check-in Chicken really works: TikTok boarding hack gets you better seats https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/check-in-chicken-really-works-tiktok-boarding-hack-gets-you-better-seats/ZBUW5AQ7FRGMTH3GRZRE3NZEKQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/check-in-chicken-really-works-tiktok-boarding-hack-gets-you-better-seats/ZBUW5AQ7FRGMTH3GRZRE3NZEKQ/ Andrea SachsBetter seats open up if you wait until departure time, but don’t get too close. Banning social media for under-16s: Kiwi kids deserve no harm, not harm reduction – Dr Samantha Marsh https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/banning-social-media-for-under-16s-kiwi-kids-deserve-no-harm-not-harm-reduction-dr-samantha-marsh/UHUUNKY3SZFVXBC7FG6WKHDFME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/banning-social-media-for-under-16s-kiwi-kids-deserve-no-harm-not-harm-reduction-dr-samantha-marsh/UHUUNKY3SZFVXBC7FG6WKHDFME/ Dr Samantha MarshOPINION: Our kids deserve more than harm reduction – they deserve no harm. Photo / Getty Images
